Privacy Policy
Last updated: 9 January 2026
AnonTalk respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how information is collected, used, and protected when you use the AnonTalk mobile application.
1. Information We Collect

AnonTalk is an anonymous platform. We do not collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, or real identity.
We may collect: • Anonymous user ID generated by Firebase Authentication • Posts, comments, and interactions created within the app • Basic usage data for analytics, performance, and crash reporting
2. How We Use Information

Collected information is used only to: • Enable anonymous posting and commenting • Improve application performance and stability • Prevent spam, abuse, or misuse • Enforce community guidelines • Comply with legal obligations when required
3. Anonymous Content

All posts and comments on AnonTalk are anonymous by default. Other users cannot see your identity.
Internally, anonymous identifiers may be used to moderate content and prevent repeated violations.
4. Content Moderation
To maintain a safe environment, content that violates our Community Guidelines may be reviewed or removed. Repeated violations may result in restrictions or bans of anonymous accounts.
5. Data Storage and Security
We use secure cloud infrastructure such as Firebase to store application data. Reasonable technical and organizational measures are taken to protect data from unauthorized access.
6. Third Party Services
AnonTalk may use third party services for authentication, analytics, and crash reporting. These services may collect limited information according to their own privacy policies.
7. Children’s Privacy
AnonTalk is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children.
8. Changes to This Policy
This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. Any changes will be reflected within the application.
9. Contact Information
If you have questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@anontalk.app
By continuing to use AnonTalk, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.
